Name: Problems and Solutions to Accompany Molecular Thermodynamics

ReviewList.Text: Pchem solutions manual's nice for figuring out how to work those problems you get stuck on. If your at the point of using this book you probably don't care what I have to say about it. There's a few errors in the book but that has nothing to do with the seller. Have a fun semester or two for that matter.
This solutions manual is excellent for showing and explaining examples.  It was worth every penny. I would recommend this book even for those in thermo using a different lecture book.
